sentences: Aitäh, kõht on täis! Võta, palun!
context: Aitäh is a common Estonian interjection used to express gratitude or thanks. It's an abbreviation of the longer phrase 'aitumad jumal' (help God), which evolved from the word 'aita' (help). This informal thank you is widely used in everyday situations, similar to how English speakers use 'thanks'.
